nodes.text: A clone naval officer was stationed in the bridge of a Venator-class Star Destroyer, the Triumphant, and participated in the Battle of Abregado under command of Jedi Master Plo Koon.

In 22 BBY, after the Separatist Subjugator-class heavy cruiser, the Malevolence, attacked three Galactic Republic ships, this clone along with a fellow officer and the rest of the crew of the Triumphant were evacuated in life-pods. While they drifted through space, they briefly managed to make contact with Plo Koon's life-pod, but were then intercepted by a squadron of rocket battle droids in a Droch-class boarding ship which opened up their pod and killed them.
This clone was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker, the actor who portrays all of the clone troopers in the series.
